name: optional-binary-lighting-pv
description: Represents an optional BACnet binary lighting PV, allowing either null or a binary-lighting-pv value.

options.name: null
options.description: Indicates the absence of a binary lighting PV value.

options.name: binary-lighting-pv
options.description: Specifies the BACnet binary lighting PV value when present.
